pages.title: Welcome To TREPIDATION
pages.text: $(bold)$(#CC1717)The game PAUSES when checking recipes and reading this book!$()

$(#551012)This book is here to assist you and provide lore, but it won't hold your hand.$(br2)Progression relies on your curiosity and diligence.$(br2)Make sure to frequently check recipes (hover over item, press R) and uses (press U) as you acquire new items.$(br2)Nearly every item has a valuable use!$()

$(italics)$(#551012)Take your time and read carefully!$() $(br2)$(#551012)TREPIDATION provides plenty of hints and information scattered in tooltips, recipes, and descriptions.$(br2)Remember, tooltips are your friend! $(br2)You'll also want to keep your inventory sorted. Use $(#104455)middle-click$(#551012) while in any inventory to auto-sort.$()

$(#551012)Be sure to check this book frequently as your acquire new items and progress. It will provide hints and lore in a concise format to respect your time. The other categories in this book will be written in lore-friendly 1st person perspective.$()
